solution_line_template: They have ${total_money} for the party because {monica_money} + {michelle_money} = <<{monica_money}+{michelle_money}={total_money}>>{total_money}
They can buy {num_soda_bottles} bottles of soda because {money_for_soda} / {soda_bottle_cost} = <<{money_for_soda}/{soda_bottle_cost}={num_soda_bottles}>>{num_soda_bottles}
They have {total_servings_soda} servings of soda because {num_soda_bottles} x {servings_per_bottle} = <<{num_soda_bottles}*{servings_per_bottle}={total_servings_soda}>>{total_servings_soda}
